title: Abridged Scientific Publications from Kodak Laboratories
aka: Abridged Scientific Publications from the Kodak Research Laboratories
Abridged Scientific Publications from the Research Laboratory of the Eastman Kodak Company
additional-note: Much of the content of this serial was adapted or reprinted from earlier publications.  We have not checked the copyright status of those earlier publications in volumes past 10.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Iren Sokolova for copyright research on this title.
